entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:05 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:05 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:05 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
